name: phpSecurityGuard
short_description: PHP Security Guard is a class written in PHP intended to search miscellaneous attacks attempt from get, post, cookies submitted data. The most current implemented attacks are SQL injection, Globals pollution, XSS, CRLF, Directory transversal, and more...
